Pre-Game Insights: The Cavaliers begin a homestand with a game against the Charlotte Hornets at Rocket Mortgage FieldHouse on January 5, 2025.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cavaliers have the best record in the NBA, but are not receiving the All-Star votes they deserve.
Others: Evan Mobley is 10th in the voting for Eastern Conference players in the front court with 145,623 votes, and Donovan Mitchell is second among guards in the East with 718,084 votes.
